fixed_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to 77.9%/83.4%/88.9% of Attack. Inflict 1-2 Curse stacks.
fixed_skill.name: Wicked Brand

innate_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to 61.8/65.5/69.2% of Attack. Chance to inflict 1 Curse stack on foes.
innate_skill.name: Maeiga

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to all foes equal to 40.8/42.8/44.9% of Attack. 1.7/1.8/1.9% chance to inflict Brainwash for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Brain Buster

innate_skill.desc: Decrease this skill's accuracy by 15%, increase critical rate by 16%, and deal Gun damage to all foes equal to 14.9/15.6/16.4% of Attack (3 hits).
innate_skill.name: Triple Down

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 20%. After using a skill on a foe, increase its Curse damage taken by 5.3% for each Curse stack on target for 1 turn. Stacks up to 4 times.
passive_skill.name: Herald of Conquest

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 20%. After using a skill on a foe, increase its Curse damage taken by 6% for each Curse stack on target for 1 turn. Stacks up to 4 times.
passive_skill.name: Herald of Conquest I

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 20%. After using a skill on a foe, increase its Curse damage taken by 6.7% for each Curse stack on target for 1 turn. Stacks up to 4 times.
passive_skill.name: Herald of Conquest II

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
